text: Bryan Frear (8 July 1933 – 1997) was an English professional footballer who played in the Football League as a striker for Huddersfield Town, Chesterfield and Halifax Town. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:1997 deaths Category:People from Cleckheaton Category:English footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Huddersfield Town A.F.C. players Category:Chesterfield F.C. players Category:Halifax Town A.F.C. players Category:English Football League players Category:Sportspeople from Yorkshire
title: Bryan Frear
